testcase.name: Navigate to Digital Services and activate a specific service
testcase.system-out: ✅ When I open the hamburger menu✅ And I navigate to Digital Services✅ And I open all services✅ And I select Music & Video✅ And I open the service details for SmartTunes✅ And I should be able to activate the service✅ And I should confirm service activation✅ Then Success screen should display
